data: At the crossing of the old avenue with the stream of present traffic, in a city which, for obvious reasons, will not be identified by the writer of these pages, there stood—and still stands—the Church of Saint Agatha’s.
crossing of the old avenue with the stream of present traffic

At the crossing of the old avenue with the stream of present traffic, in a city which, for obvious reasons, will not be identified by the writer of these pages, there stood--and still stands--the Church of Saint Agatha's.
Phelps, Elizabeth Stuart, 1844-1911; Smith, E. Boyd (Elmer Boyd), 1860-1943 [Illustrator]; Woodbury, Marcia Oakes, 1865-1913 [Illustrator]
